item.description:
From the days of Eve to the modern day plane Jane, women have always perplexed men.

She can be an extremely complex enigma and yet as simple and clear as water from a spring. In the words of the famous English playwriter William Congrev "Heaven hath no rage like a love to hatred turned, nor hell a fury like a woman scorned."

Time and again, She has left her foot prints on the pages of history.

She can be bold (Indira Gandhi), beautiful (Helen of Troy), brains (Mary Curie) and bi-ceps (Laila Ali :) )

Life is easy for men as all they are needed for is moving heavy objects and scaring away the cockroaches :) But a woman, She plays many roles in her life time and each role comes with its own unique blend of compassion, courgae, compromise and strength.

As a tribute to this wonderful creation of the almighty, we invite all our desi-sisterns for an evening of fun, frolic, pampering and lots of chitting and chatting.

You may call it a "Ladies Night" or "Girls Night" or whatever. We call it "An evening by the women, for the women, of the women."

Men, you are not invited but then we know that you don't listen anyways. So if you wish to come, come at your own risk :) And ofcourse, we do not intend to take your chivarly away.
So if you come, you will have to pick the check :)"

The Venue is Cuchi Cuchi (Isn't that cute? ) at Central Square, Cambridge MA. Hope to see you all wonderful ladies there...:)
item.how_to_find_us: lets get at Cuchi Cuchi after work, around 6ish
item.name: Girls night out !!
